events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application was categorized under Engineering as you have experience with software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and your skills in software engineering match our expectations.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-05 at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and demonstrated excellent software knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-07 at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went well, showing a great fit with the companyâ€™s values and team environment.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the software engineering position including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
You have accepted the offer and we are thrilled to welcome you on board as part of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with access to our internal tools and an introduction to your engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully; you have fully integrated into the Engineering department.
